attributes.action: stop the axing of 'Neighbours' from the BBC. The actions of Ramsay Street should be followed daily.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is questionable whether any one programme has any more of a effect than Neighbours. Life without Harold, Lou, The Kennedys and others is not a life...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
